quality_assessment: Good documentation with accurate examples and helpful workflow diagrams. Minor improvements possible for additional event types and MkDocs Material features.

issues.description: Documentation shows limited event types. The codebase includes many more event types like AgentProgress, AgentRetrying, CheckpointCreated, WorktreeCreated, DLQItemAdded, ClaudeToolInvoked, etc. that could be documented for comprehensive debugging.
issues.fix_suggestion: Consider adding examples for other useful event types like ClaudeToolInvoked for debugging Claude interactions, CheckpointCreated for state issues, and DLQItemAdded for tracking failures.

issues.description: The section would benefit from tabbed examples showing different command variations (e.g., with jq filters vs raw output) using MkDocs Material tabs feature.
issues.fix_suggestion: Add tabbed content blocks using ??? and !!! syntax for alternative approaches to log inspection.

issues.description: The performance metrics section could benefit from admonitions (tips/info boxes) highlighting key metrics to watch for and warning signs.
issues.fix_suggestion: Add !!! tip and !!! warning admonitions around performance thresholds and best practices.

issues.description: EventFilter supports additional filter fields like time_range and event_types that aren't shown in examples.
issues.fix_suggestion: Add examples showing time-based filtering and event type filtering for more targeted debugging.

positive_aspects: Excellent Mermaid flowchart diagram for debugging workflow
Accurate bash examples with jq for log inspection
Source code references with line numbers for transparency
Code annotations using MkDocs Material syntax (1)!, (2)!, (3)!
Practical calculation examples for success rate
Correlation ID tracking is well explained
improvement_suggestions: Add tabbed examples for different debugging scenarios (agent failure vs timeout vs resource issues)
Include admonitions for tips on common debugging patterns
Add cross-references to related pages (DLQ, event-tracking, log-management)
Consider adding a troubleshooting table for common error patterns
Document ClaudeToolInvoked and ClaudeTokenUsage events for AI-specific debugging

metadata.validation_focus: Auto-discovered page - check for drift and enhance with visual features
